entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cross built ILCompiler NuGet contains HostOS (Linux) ELFs not TargetOS (FreeBSD) ELFs #104497
  • Use of "Repeat" seems incorrect #104495
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests CI timeouts #104492
    9.0.0
  • `Debug.Assert(_readAheadTaskStatus == ReadAheadTask_CompletionReserved);` failure in HttpConnection #104491
  • Path.IsPathRooted is incompatible with certain filesystems #104490
  • JIT: nullcheck is not folded for PHI #104489
    Future
  • JIT: SVE `CreateBreak*` APIs should do the `ConditionalSelect` optimization #104486
    Future
  • JIT: mcs dumpMap broken on at least one recent collection #104482
    9.0.0
  • Any way to revert to pre-7.0 isolated assembly loading in C++/CLI? #104480
  • A simple method that performs unboxing is considered unprofitable inlinee, preventing box stack allocation #104479
    9.0.0
  • [Docs] Update API docs for IServiceScopeFactory.CreateScope #104472
  • Null ref in JSMarshalerArgument.ToManaged #104470
  • Move the creation of telemetry handlers out of HttpClientHandler #104468
    Future
  • A potential out-of-bound read in `RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver` #104466
  • [mono][wasm] DllImport with value-type args that contain unsupported marshalled fields crashes AOT compiler #104463
    9.0.0
  • [MSVC][x86] Failed to build with error C2488: 'naked' can only be applied to non-member function definitions #104460
  • App crashes with an output "Trace/Breakpoint Trap" on Linux when a P/Invoke callback is called from a native library if the dotnet debugger is attached. #104459
  • Race condition during TraceSource Initialization/Refresh #104457

Closed

  • JIT: Try more optimal fixpoint computation strategies for liveness #86527
    9.0.0
  • More granular X.509 certificate loader #91763
    9.0.0
  • HostFxr - calling load_assembly_and_get_function_pointer return -2146234280 #104436
  • Support LDAPS ( TLS ) in System.DirectoryServices.Protocols ON Linux #103243
  • AiaAcceptsCertTypesAndIgnoresNonCertTypes test failure in CI #104375
  • Long running System.ComponentModel tests #103265
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 9/22/2023 12:22:36 AM #92774
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 8/11/2023 7:34:28 PM #91941
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 5/13/2024 4:59:01 PM #102322
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteLargeToStream #101016
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests.ConcurrentQueueTests.ManyConcurrentAddsTakesPeeks_ForceContentionWithOtherThreadsPeeking(seconds: 1) #91368
    9.0.0
  • Improve and unify debug views of immutable dictionaries #94289
    9.0.0
  • Timeout in System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers #101193
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add IEnumerator.CanReset #103855
  • [API Proposal]: bool HashSet.Add(T, out T actualValue) #103885
  • [wasm] Typo in browser-bench wasm app #93777
    9.0.0
  • Apple mobile JIT_Directed runtime tests failures: System.DllNotFoundException: EmptyStructsLib #104430
  • JIT build failure with clang 10 #104442

PullRequests

Created

  • Add some helper functions for getting the intrinsic ID to use for a given oper #104498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update readAheadTask asserts in HttpConnection #104496
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Fix GatherPrefetch and Prefetch APIs #104494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Fix PHI non-null pattern #104493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace uses of `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Update natvis to show VNs #104485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete some unused HRESULT macro definitions #104484
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Re-try when browser's WBT fail with `System.TimeoutException` #104481
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `ConvertToSingle`, `ConvertToDouble`; fix `CovertTo*` tests #104478
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [browser] Add test case for `maxParallelDownloads` #104476
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [build.ps1] Set the default architecture using an environment variable #104474
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Support retbuf optimization for non 'lvIsTemp' locals #104467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Assertion prop equivalent phis #104458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Arm64/Sve: Implement AbsoluteCompare* and Compare* APIs #104464
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Remove `virtual` modifier from `InternalFallback` #104483
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix typo in typo fix for RSASSA-PSS #104477
    area-System.Security
  • Obsolete X509Certificate{2} constructors and X509Certificate2Collection.Import #104165
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Don't use SyncTextWriter in single-threaded wasm builds #101221
    arch-wasm
  • Lower GetElement on arm64 to the correct access sequence #104288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add RetryHelper to AIA test #104381
    area-System.Security
  • Fix typo in RSASignaturePaddingMode #104473
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Remove `virtual` modifier from `GetDatePart` #104456
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Remove `virtual` modifier from `Calendar.CurrentEraValue` #104453
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Unify debug views of immutable dictionaries #100745
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip old promotion for retbuf defined locals #104439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disable old promotion for structs with significant padding #104438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid unobserved task exceptions in Http tests #104384
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix a typo in browser-bench wasm app #104434
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Fix "elaborated type specifier" for enum class in JIT #104450
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Apple] Disable EmptyStructs tests for apple mobile due to missing support for native libraries #104433
    arch-arm64, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [RISC-V] Fix coreclr test coreroot_determinism.sh #104140
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix GetStaticsBases #104412
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Simplify Emit SignatureHelper WriteSimpleSignature #104220
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution

Updated

  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime (second attempt) #104454
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2489311 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.ConditionalExtract* APIs #104150
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add a config flag to experiment with some work item prioritization changes in cases involving a lot of sync-over-async #103983
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [8.0] Add a config flag to experiment with some work item prioritization changes in cases involving a lot of sync-over-async #103984
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • Use ConcurrentDictionary to avoid threading issues #104407
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary endianness dependent logic #104332
    area-System.Memory
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http
  • (WIP) Arm64/SVE: Implemented `AddRotateComplex` and `AddSequentialAcross` #104258
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Use basic forwarder in down-level support if any parameters can't be marshalled #104416
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #104408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Remove `CallArg::m_tmpNum` #104429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix size of dirent buffer on illumos #104448
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Swap MetricsHandler and DiagnosticsHandler #104455
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [WIP][Apple-Mobile][HybridGlobalization] Fix DatePattern formats + add new tests #102464
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [wasi] enable WASMTIME_BACKTRACE_DETAILS #104446
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Fix an issue with complex number parsing #104388
    area-System.Numerics
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
